entry.data:
SNOW LIKELY
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
CALM WINDS
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

SNOW
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE MORNING
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 4 TO 6 INCHES
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
